item.title: Yelling error
item.dc:creator: @Lil_wayne_fan Lil wayne fan
item.description:
@Lil_wayne_fan wrote:

[code] if(cmd[0].equals("::yell")) {
String yellText = command.substring(5);
for(Player p : World.getInstance().getPlayerList()) {
if (p ==null) {
continue;
}

					if(player.getRights() == 4) {
						p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<shad=000000><col=0066CC>[Owner]<img=1>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.upper(yellText));
                                            }
					if(player.getRights() == 3) {
						p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<shad=000000><col=00CC00>[Co-Owner]<img=1>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.upper(yellText));
                                            }
					if(player.getRights() == 2) {
						p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<shad=000000><col=CC0033>[Admin]<img=1>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.upper(yellText));
                                            }
					if(player.getRights() == 1) {
						p.getActionSender().sendMessage("<shad=000000><col=9933FF>[Mod]<img=0>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.upper(yellText));
                                            }
					if(player.getRights() == 0) {
						p.getActionSender().sendMessage("[Chronic]<col=F52997>"+player.getUsername()+": "+Misc.upper(yellText));	
		}
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
